website_summaries.verdict: The AirPods are more comfortable and cost less, but the Skybuds are one of the better totally wireless earphones out there right now.
pros: The water-resistant Skybuds are a set of totally wireless earphones that sound pretty decent, are easy to operate and set up and maintained a reliable wireless connection with mostly hiccup-free Bluetooth audio streaming
The included case delivers five charges, and their "awareness" mode that lets ambient sound in when needed
cons: Their design is a little generic and the sound is only good, not great
They cost more than the AirPods

customer_reviews.title: Started great, now not so much
customer_reviews.text: These started off amazing. Best sound I've heard, loved the power charging case and the way they "lock" into the ear. However, it's been a month and like a lot of other earbuds I've had, the charge doesn't last like it did in the beginning. I used to get several hours out of them, now 30mins and the case isn't charging either. SkyBuds customer service, while friendly, not helpful at all. Basically "too bad" response. I can post a dozen similar scenarios of the photo posted in this review.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLA

customer_reviews.title: There are pros and cons.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Attractive, sleek case and earbud design. The "AWARENESS" feature would be really cool if I didn't work in a loud warehouse. The sound quality is better than most. They fit really well in my ear with their 'locking in' kind of design when fitting in ears. They're comfortable enough to wear all day, if the battery would last that long. The app is nice, to see battery percentage remaining. Cons: I wish I could use the left earbud independently of the right. I'm only getting about 2 hours of play time from the battery. The "Skydock" is constantly disconnecting and "not in range" notification. The Bluetooth range isn't as good as some, but as good as most.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and really liked them until the volume in the right earphone quit working. The website (skybuds.com) is no longer active and there is no customer support. I have see a number of reports of the same issue. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: David Horney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trade-off of truly no wires
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Volume is not good, sound is thin, and one side of the charging case never stays connected to the earbud to charge it. These have also been painful to wear. There is a piece that is not molded to be smooth that pushes on my ear and almost feels as if it is cutting after wearing for 30 minutes plus. The only positive I can leave about this is that there is no wire.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: Small and good sound
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best Bluetooth earbuds I bout and I bought a lot of them. These things have grate sound. They are supper small and look grate in the ear. Dont buy those crapy aple air pods that cauts $200. These are 100% better than the air pods. For me to charge the case it took me about 30 to 45 mins. I would defently recommend these to any won looking for Bluetooth ear buds. Also they dont come charged so you have to charge the case. They also stay in your ears varry well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them and great to use you just have to download the app to pare with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bj Carter

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I took then skiing and I work out with them and they stay in no problem and are super comfortable. They don't go super loud, but I guess that's okay because they really are noise cancelling, better than any other headphones I've tried. I was worried about losing them since they are so small but the super sleek charging case makes them easy to store and stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on 8/31/17. At first they were great but the quality quickly diminished. As of 3/5/19, the battery life is about 30 mins (at best) and I will frequently have one die significantly sooner than the other even though they have been charging and the dock says it’s at 100%. Definitely would not recommend this product. I expect a $200 (when I purchased them) pair of head phones to lay longer than 18 months
customer_reviews.author: Molly Balanay

customer_reviews.title: Great for spying and listening in on conversations but not for the gym low sould volume.
customer_reviews.text: I really wished these played louder I actually liked these a lot bit had to send them back because the sould although was good the volume was not bad but didn't quite do it for me I like my music loud and with deep base.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this product and use them after watching YouTube videos about them. I saw the app and how cool it was to offer GPS, Noice cancellation, and the hear through feature. Only to find out THE APP NO LONGER EXIST! So all the features these headphones offer are USELESS! On top of this the right headphone stopped working after one test use. Do not buy this product and let this company fool you
customer_reviews.author: Angelique & Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Small Buds Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound and easy to pair. I've tried lots of headphones over the years and these are my favorite by far. Love saying goodbye to the wires, and the charging case I find very useful. The fact that it fits in my pocket is a nice bonus! Highly recommend to anyone looking for quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest and easiest paid of esr buds made, in my opinion. I have tried many brands and these are the most comfortable and the siund quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristene Snakard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy,could be cheaper. Time will tell if it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are great! There is no difficulty in connecting to your device(phone,laptop etc..) The audio quality is excellent,they fit perfectly in my ears which are small. The battery life is really good, as soon as your workout is finished the case charges to 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a few months and the quality of it is amazing however I’ve noticed while I was using them the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for a few months and the quality of it is amazing however I’ve noticed while I was using them the audio would sometimes just cut out. Also the left bud won’t even charge anymore so it’s completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Angel Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Game changers
customer_reviews.text: These things are without a doubt a game changer. They fit comfortable and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: RONNY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not that great and didn't like how the app doesn't work well. Didn't like how you need the right ear bud in for the left to work. And left bud would never pair with phone.
customer_reviews.author: pericles

customer_reviews.title: They don't last long and no customer support!
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first but over the course of just a few months there were issues with battery life and connection to the phone. Just five months after buying they're totally worthless now. I tried sending a message to customer service and the automated response said they'd get back to me in 2 business days. A week later, I haven't heard a thing. These are too expensive to be disposable. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great first truely wireless earbuds buy.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly let them go a couple months ago but when I had them they were really good. But the only problem i had was you had to have the right in close proximity for the left to work. But the battery life was good and the range was excellent. The app was good too except it always asked for my location (for the find my earbud thing.)
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffs. Amazing price in US
customer_reviews.text: Great stuffs. Amazing price in US. For some reasons, I had to buy on Amazon.com instead of CA because There was a marge of 120$ CAN (around 100 US) on both, with shipping and taxe. However, the product is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very long battery life :(
customer_reviews.text: They work very well but the battery charge doesn't last that long and they don't work well in moist or wet weather which is unfortunate. Sound quality is good, case for carrying is nice. App is pretty handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't function as advertised. In my experience, I bought the first pair and the charging box LED lights turned red and lashed an error code. So I sent them back now the second pair, the pod changing box will not hold a charge. They advise on the packaging "24 battery life",but this is false. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and charging is a major issue
customer_reviews.text: Have issues constantly with charging.... left them on the charger all day to find them dead when i need them.... too bad.... sound quality is good.... just can't use them when i need them... also battery life is horrible.... 30 to 40 mins on a charge
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: These pair of air-phone work great and come in a great presentation
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav products I've ever bought. These pair of air-phone work great and come in a great presentation. They are comfortable, easy to use and soft on your ears. The sound quality is great too! I totally would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great but now a $200 paper weight
customer_reviews.text: They were great at first. Held a change for a long time and no issues connecting. Now I have to plug them in 3 or 4 times and mess with them before they will charge. Then when they have a charge you have to mess around with them for 30 minutes before I can get them to connect and play audio. The app is useless and doesn't work half the time and that's the only way to connect them. The first month they were amazing and I was so happy. Now I guess I have to put them away and hope a software update fixes all of the issues...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Maybe they're only good brand new out of the box?
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality but I got this from Amazon Warehouse and the headphone just wouldn't hold a charge. Idk if it's was because they were refurbished or what but I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Granados

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Pricetag
customer_reviews.text: These are simply great. Nice, full sound, good battery, charging case is solid, and they are super easy to use. Definitely a must have if you have the budget. Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.author: Alec B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered the first pair and they wouldn't charge at all. So I received a replacement pair and they were defective also. So I give them zero stars. Very disappointed since they are a Amazon favorite .
customer_reviews.author: donna mccawley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound; fits well in the ears; looks great; great battery life; no wires; does not look like the Apple IPod with that ridiculous antenna popping out of the ear bud.
customer_reviews.author: goldens

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones sounds good works well only reason four stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones sounds good works well only reason four stars is because not able to use the left bud without the right bud other than that it's a great set of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Earpiece System.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and range, kinda expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Rakowski

customer_reviews.title: Design is great and app is intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal sound quality. Design is great and app is intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not regret these.
customer_reviews.text: So far, the SkyBuds have definitely been the best quality true-wireless earbuds that I have found. My only complaint is that these earbuds seem to be wonky with their connecting here and there. Generally, connecting is fine. Sometimes, however, if you un-pair them, they can be difficult to pair back. It can take a few attempts. Sound quality is great; Definitely more noise-canceling than any other wireless earbuds I've tried; Amazing battery time as well. Also, the app is neat!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Awesome sound quality and extremely comfortable. Perfect for working out and they stay in your ears during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 month owner
customer_reviews.text: I have had my sky buds for 4 months and one bud stoppped working properly. I am contacting sky buds to see if they can fix my issue or at least fix my buds under the warranty
customer_reviews.author: saler32

customer_reviews.title: Their alright
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them they worked great now they work all right I tried to get the app for them but they took it off the App Store
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Big Fail
customer_reviews.text: Only one worked when I rec’d them. The working piece sounded like crap anyway. Big Fail
customer_reviews.author: Scott Embrey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy the product was broken in pieces and did not work
customer_reviews.author: Jaleel Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a month. After this the right and left skybuds are not syncing at all. When performed a reset, I am unable to trigger the pairing with iPhone. I have tried the 3x button press on the right sky buds many times but could not trigger the connection at all. Checked skybuds website and there was a suggestion to press for 15 seconds to completely reset the skybuds and restart the pairing procedure. Still I'm unable to trigger the pairing. The only thing now these headsets do is restarting and that is it. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RamR

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for working out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase wireless headphones for working out, because the wires were always getting in the way. But was worried that they would fall out my ears or not have great sound quality. I gave these a try on a recommendation from a friend, and I am so happy I did. They never need readjusting in my ears-because they basically lock in place. The sound quality is great, and this silver color feels really hi-tech. Its really transformed my workouts. Really happy with my purchase-well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very little use and earbuds stopped charging. Sound is not what expected for the hefty price. Wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Couto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Awesome! Love love love these.
customer_reviews.author: sanessa

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I generally dislike earphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I generally dislike earphones, so I was skeptical at first. But these provide great clarity of sound, block unwanted noise, and fit snugly but not overly tightly in your ear so that you are not constantly reminded that you have something in there. They are also easy to use so you won't spend hours figuring out how to hook them up to your other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Dolin

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable — and it ruins the whole experience
customer_reviews.text: 1. They are low on battery every morning when I try to use them. I store them in the box, making sure the box is fully charged, but for some reason they are low on juice. 2. The sound is interrupted sometimes when the phone is in the pocket of my pants. 3. Software updates sometimes bring some new bugs and I have to wait for some weeks for them to be fixed. I wish I could return them and get the money back!
customer_reviews.author: Payalnik

customer_reviews.title: New favorite headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, especially for working out. I've been using these for a while now. The sound quality is phenomenal. They fit securely and have not fallen out (even while working out). Once you take them out of the dock they connect to your phone instantly and I've never had a problem with them disconnecting! While I've only used them for a few phone calls, the microphone seems to work well. Battery life has been good, exactly what I expected. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Quality workout earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds for sure! After I found the right sizing for each ear they fit like a charm and did not fall out at all during my cardio workouts. Had some difficulties at first with connecting them to my Bluetooth, but that was all soon fixed once I downloaded the users Manuel. Would definitely recommend these for working out, daily use, and for quality ear buds that have such a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Totally life-changing!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these - they've totally changed the way I listen to music. They've made my workouts, my subway ride, all my traveling so much better. The sound quality is incredible - amazingly clear, they don't fall out and are super comfortable, and I can use them for hours with one battery charge!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT WITH ANDROID!!!
customer_reviews.text: A RUNNER'S BESTFRIEND!!! Love, love this product sooo much!! It works well with my Samsung! Keeps me company on my runs and I can't wait to take them on my next race! I love the convenience that the skydock and the Skybuds app provides! This product exceeded my expectations and I highly recommend it! This product exceeded my expectations and I highly recommend it to every runner and Android user! Keep it up Skybuds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wanted to love it connectivity for this unit was one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: wanted to love it connectivity for this unit was one of the best but the sound quality and volume was subpar in my opinion maybe I like more deep sounding base or overall richer sound also they hurt my ears after a short period of time; otherwise great product looks good and good fast charger!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Decent devices
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality. Fit is reasonably comfortable. Getting connection to iPhone was mostly easy, but setup was difficult. Trying to get synced to MacBook Pro has not been successful and
customer_reviews.author: John Concannon

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but if your phone is in you pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea but if your phone is in you pocket front or back either one for me the ear buds cuts out every 10 seconds or so. Emailed company and they said that’s normal and that I would have to hold the phone while using ear buds kind of pointless if your wanting hands free use.
customer_reviews.author: ixion1

customer_reviews.title: Losing battery life
customer_reviews.text: I started out loving these earbuds They don't have the features many do but they always worked great. They fit pretty well and sounded good. That opinion is quickly changing though. They no longer keep a charge longer than an hour and a half, if that. I'd be hesitant before buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, long lasting charge. Good fit and good sound.
customer_reviews.author: bryan bope

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly worth it
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are completely worth the money. They're comfortable and the sound quality is amazing. I have never been happier to enjoy listening to music on the go. No more choking myself with wires. Or having to untangle them. I can't believe I can make calls with them too. They're extremely cool and I'm happy to have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. The best wireless buds BY FAR. Best purchase I've ever made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Shinn-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is very bad. I got these for my wife and she ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very bad. I got these for my wife and she did not like them for that reason so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D Gillham

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED these when I first got them but after one ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these when I first got them but after one week of use, the left one has stopped working. So sad because they were awesome for skiing
customer_reviews.author: julie Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Honest suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought that hey this is more than 200 bucks it must be quite good and I still bought the product despite the negative comments. The result is I returned it. Seriously don't try this coz it is not as good as airpods. Sound quality is so so so bad, not as good as my gas station 10 dollars earphones. It doesn't worth this price tag, but if you are rich and Wanna waste money you to buy these. Bluetooth was ok and it looks so dumb in ur ears.
customer_reviews.author: Retr0

customer_reviews.title: Would've really like this to have worked
customer_reviews.text: Mine stopped playing audio after 3 days of use. Would've really like this to have worked...
customer_reviews.author: George Ku

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for anyone on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with my pair of Skybuds. They came in a stylish charging case that was a little smaller than a deck of cards. The sound quality is excellent. They sound better than my Jaybirds and the battery life is about 3x longer! Hoping that in the future they extend the battery life even longer. They stay in my ears even when bouncing around - I'm able to run / jump rope w/o issue. Highly recommend these for people looking for a premium set of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied! The sound quality is good at least for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied! The sound quality is good at least for this size as wireless buds. The connection is stable and strong. And it looks awesome!!! I feels the power of FUTURE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and feel of these headphones! They fit in my ear snug and do not move around or feel like they are going to fall out. They sound good and the battery lasts for around 4 hours. Although the right ear bud dies faster than the left ear, I did not find this to be a problem. I have been using these at the office and while traveling and have only one real compliant. When using these to talk to someone on the phone the person on the other line reported that they could barely hear me. Again this really doesn't bother me as I will be using them to listen to music and watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK PRODUCT DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! These worked great for 1 month and then the left earbud stopped working completely. It was fully charged and is not damaged. The app won't recognize it as being in range although it's in the charging box. These are $200 worth of junk. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shae Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Battery life was terrible. This product is just simply TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was awful. App was not user friendly at all, and wanted me to do a 3 hour update. Battery life was terrible. This product is just simply TERRIBLE !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent charging issues
customer_reviews.text: Returned first pair after a fully charged dock wouldn't charge the right ear bud. This time it's the left. At this price, a simple function like charging should be dialed in BEFORE going to market. Will be returning second pair shortly and looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Nakadai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once I walked through the set up I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Choppy and/or Dropped Connection to iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Great potential but was never able to maintain a stable connection with my iPhone. If I held my iPhone in my hand, the connection would drop. If I put a case on my iPhone, connection would either drop or become choppy. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Recommended the Air Buds? No!
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this product at all. Very little volume and practically no base! I responded back to the manufacturer regarding these 2 issues. I informed them that the problem that I was having was that the sound was different between my cell and IPod? With recent ear pieces like wired Bose or Beats I was not having this problem. I wanted to go totally wireless for working out in the gym. Manufacture suggest that I update my older IPod to a more recent version. That I did with no improvement. Too bad I was ready!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sad.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Left ear bud died after only a few days of use. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: David Trigueros

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent. The only downside is if you are small ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. The only downside is if you are small in stature the Skybuds may not fit your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its not working. One of the earbuds in not working at all
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed AL-Harasi

customer_reviews.title: Android users read first
customer_reviews.text: Despite claims of being compatible with Android phones these earbuds aren't. I was really hoping these would be my end to searching for wireless earbuds, unfortunately I'll have to find something else. Additionally if you own an Android device and want to know if they ever fix the compatibility check the skybuds app on Google play store first. I wish I had done that, I wouldn't of gotten my hopes up and wasted my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: These don't work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I have found no signs of life in these earbuds. There was only one small set of directions, and that didn't do anything. I thought perhaps they needed to be charged so I tried that overnight and still nothing. I went to the website that was supposed to let me download a manual and it no longer exists. I sent an email and haven't heard anything back yet. There are lights on the charger, but without a manual I don't know what they mean. These will be returned if I can't get any satisfaction soon.
customer_reviews.author: MaDrap

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but company went out of business
customer_reviews.text: The company that created this went out of business. That means you won't be able to update the firmware on these and if the app gets out of date the app may disappear from the various app stores. Having said that, the app isn't very important and these still function very well as regular bluetooth earbuds. The price has gone down quite a bit since they went out of business, so this may still be worth buying. Just be aware of what you are getting into.
customer_reviews.author: valiant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after the first listen they do not charge any longer. They did sound good. I was disappointed the app was no longer and the reason I wanted them was null. But my son thought they were good and wanted them. He put them on the charger and they never would take a charge. I’m very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ternes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair and really great sound
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated how easy it was to pair with my phone and get started. Its a totally different experience to go wireless. The buds part fits well in my ear, maybe a bit bigger than I expected but they stay in fine. Most important they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super slippery ear buds I could not connect charging case ...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing product. Super slippery ear buds I could not connect charging case to the buds until I gave up. Then the right and left ear buds kept disconnecting from each other every 3 seconds. Can’t enjoy your music that way
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: These have good clear sound but ear buds have inconsistent Bluetooth conductivity
customer_reviews.text: These have good clear sound but ear buds have inconsistent Bluetooth conductivity, I could not get the right side ear bud to connect it kept saying it was out if range, even after the update. The volume is very low and I could only get the awareness feature to work on the left side ear bud. I'm dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: D.A

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and they fit my small ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these SPECIFICALLY for the “awareness” feature. I wanted to listen to music while not being completely deaf from people talking to me. It doesn’t work. When I have both headphones in, I can’t hear anything other than music. So I only wear 1 at a time. The left headphone won’t work by itself. The sound is great and they fit my small ears, but Yhey get sore after a while. But too expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireQ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Workds really well except left side can not be separated form the right in order for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to sync and I didn't realize how nice it ...
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to sync and I didn't realize how nice it was having wireless headphones but not being tethered to my phone is great. Sound quality is way better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Kolier

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work right out of the box. Wouldn’t charge and as it turns out this product’s company no longer exists. Thankful for Amazon’s generous return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Charging pod quits working.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return in Feb. Bought in Dec as a Christmas present. Charging pod quit charging. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got my skybuds. I was a little worried to set them up because I usually have a hard time with Bluetooth products but as soon as you turn the earbuds on, a woman's voice walks you through every step! I had my Bluetooth connected in minutes. They sound great and the volume gets really loud. The earbuds are also noise canceling so when I'm listening to my music I don't have to worry about background noise. I used the skybuds at the gym and was very pleased that I didn't have to worry about them falling out either. They were very secure. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for Bluetooth earbuds!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome! Great sound quality and excellent noise cancellation. I'm practically dead to the world the minute I put them on. Perfect for when I'm studying and the neighborhood kids are running around outside or if I am at the Gym and don't like their playlist. Highly recommend for anyone seeking silence and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rafik Takla

customer_reviews.title: No more tangled headphone mess
customer_reviews.text: These stay in great and it's nice how travel friendly they are. No more tangled mess! I like that they come in various colors I got the black ones. The air pods only are in white which I feel like would get dirty easily. The only negative I have to say is the charge time is 4 hours which isn't great. But since this seems to be a new technology I'm sure it'll get better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended.  Great sound and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I these worked even better than I expected. The size is perfect, easy to carry around with me and the clarity of the sound is great. I sounds like the music is coming from inside my head. Was easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: pair with my Bluetooth iphone 7 in a sec and good to go
customer_reviews.text: After seeing several reviews from other websites and customers, I ordered them in silver. shipping was very fast. They were already charged about 30%, turn them on, pair with my Bluetooth iphone 7 in a sec and good to go. Sound is amazing and base is good, very clear quality. They actually fit really good in my ears and stay their. I put them in the fancy charger, upgrade process to latest firmware was easy and quick. The iOS app is so fancy, left ear, right ear, dock, location, and Bluetooth is verbose. I like it, so I do not have to wonder if there is an issue. Overall, very satisfied and happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elias

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fit is great but I couldn't get the buds to connect to my phone. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: john oliver

customer_reviews.title: Sound is terrific, I just need help from developer
customer_reviews.text: My left skybud does not register percentage charged. So far I'm unable to fix it! Unable to get help from source! Sound is terrific,I just need help from developer , don't know if problem can be fixed or need to return it! I have texted them with details.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I purchased these
customer_reviews.text: Initially had a question getting started and customer service.was superlative! I'm so happy I purchased these. Comfortable fit. Battery life, sound quality, even the storage/recharging case are all great. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JalaR

customer_reviews.title: Second Choice to Apple AirPods sound. But these fit better.
customer_reviews.text: They are good but unmatched to sound of the Apple Airpods. No comparison in sound. These do fit better in the ears for a much more vigorous workout.
customer_reviews.author: Bo knows a little.

customer_reviews.title: ... anywhere near the money do not buy if you enjoy
customer_reviews.text: very weak sound no bass doesn't pair well not worth anywhere near the money do not buy if you enjoy music
customer_reviews.author: darth vader

customer_reviews.title: Better get a 3rd party warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from Amazon. Tried to charge and the case connector was recessed on one side which did not allow the buds to charge. Contacted Skybuds and they did not want to help. Looks like they won't honor it if it's bought on Amazon. Returning to Amazon on going with a brand that has some semblance of trustworthy/reliable company
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to worth it
customer_reviews.text: The right bud drains crazy fast and doesn't take a charge. The left only works at half volume of the right. The dock doest charge them unless plugged in. Sound is OK but connection is not stable.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE ANDROID
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. These apparently DO NOT WORK WITH ANDROID Phones and Skybuds doesn't care. They basically told us we were out of luck. Why would anyone buy earbuds that don't work with android phones? UUGGHH.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: do not buy until they fix their battery doc it keeps malfunctioning , contacted manufacturer they don't care
customer_reviews.author: dave69

product_meta.title: Skybuds Truly Wireless Earbuds – Nimbus (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver

Listen. Talk. Go. Skybuds revolutionize the way you listen & move with 24 hrs of on-the-go charge & the strongest connection available on the market using absolutely no wires, and can connect with any Bluetooth device. Skybuds are the next generation of truly wireless, perfect for the most active gym-goer or traveler. Skybuds have been specifically engineered to have a comfortable and secure fit ensuring they don’t fall out. Skybuds, Simply Truly Wireless.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Truly Wireless Unrivaled Sound Skybuds provide a wire-free, premium audio experience every time thanks to Passive Noise Cancellation, top-of-the-line balanced armature drivers, and psychoacoustic features including bass enhancement.

Best-In-Class Battery Life Each Skybud provides 4hrs of continuous on-the-go listening, and the Skydock charging and storage case conveniently provides up to 24hrs of additional battery life.




Strongest, Reliable Connection Skybuds pioneer the joint use of NFMI technology and Bluetooth technology to ensure the strongest, reliable connection available on the market.

Secure Personalized Fit & Sweatproof A sleek, ergonomic design plus 3 different sized fit tips (S, M, L) create a personalized and secure fit every time. Plus Skybuds are sweatproof and water-resistant - the perfect companion for workouts.

Digital Microphone Each Skybud has a digital MEMS microphone so you can also take calls while on-the-go hands and wire-free.




Changing the world of portable audio A New York City based company focused on creating a premium truly wireless audio experience. We strive to change the way people enjoy and experience sound. Our products reflect our values: unparalleled quality, secured comfort and effortless elegance.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Truly Wireless Earbuds

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Because of our common love for music, interest in podcasts, and hectic, multitasking lifestyles, the need for portable audio is so well-ingrained in people’s lives. Compared to the radical changes emerging in other portable and personal electronic verticals, however, the audio space has been slow to evolve and enhance the way people enjoy and experience on-the-go sound without compromising quality. With Skybuds, we are dedicated to transforming the on-the-go listening experience by making portable sound not only convenient, but also exceptional.

What makes your product special?

Skybuds best address the three pain points associated with earbuds: 1) Connection: Skybuds pioneer the use of Near Field Magnetic Induction (NFMI) technology creating the strongest, most reliable connection available on the market; 2) Battery Life: Skybuds have best-in-class battery life with 24hrs of on-the-go listening; and 3) Fit & Comfort: Skybuds are ergonomically designed to comfortably sit in users’ ears, providing a perfect fit and locking in exceptional sound quality.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Breathing life into Skybuds and transforming it from a mere idea on a sheet of paper to a physical product has been incredibly rewarding. Every user comment and note of how Skybuds has become a necessity in his/her life drives us to dream of how we can further introduce change to the portable audio world.
feature_bullets: 4hrs of continuous listening with an additional 24hrs of on-the-go charge.
iOS and Android app with features Find My Skybuds and Awareness which lets you hear the outside world around you.
Sweatproof and water-resistant. Ergonomically crafted for a comfortable and secure fit.
Truly wireless earbuds with premium sound quality and digital microphone for phone calls
